name: HUNGER
description: HUNGER: Computer game in the genre of survival, telling the story of a lonely soldier, abandoned to an unexplored island. People say that there is life on this island and the settlers of this island are building their civilization there.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 6600 / ATI Radeon X1300 256 Mb DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Realtek HD Additional Notes: keyboard, mouse
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 6600 / ATI Radeon X1300 1 Gb DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Realtek HD Additional Notes: keyboard, mouse
